page.title: 17A Local Priest (R.C.)
page.content: A catholic priest came to school today and we discovered the following things about him.His full name is Father Peter Maguire.He has two churches, the Church of the Annunciation in Eckington and the Church of the Imaculate Conception in Spinkhill.He told us that being apriest is a full time job but he does have some hobbies mainly reading and sport.In his spare time he does a lot of voluntary work with mothers and young babies.He was 24 when he became apriest and he is now 37.He told us that catholic priests don't get married so that they can give all of their time to the church.He wears special long clothes when he is taking a service to remind everyone that he is representing Jesus.He was born in Pontefract,went to school in Leeds and trained to be a priest in Durham.He was very helpful.
